trans-unit.source: Contains a description of a mapped relationship between a source table and a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含源表之间的映射关系的说明和<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This class is used by a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataAdapter"></xref> when populating a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此类由<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataAdapter"></xref>填充时<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A DataTableMapping provides a master mapping between the data returned from a query against a data source, and a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: DataTableMapping 提供从数据源和一种<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>针对查询返回的数据之间的主映射

trans-unit.source: The DataTableMapping name can be passed in place of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> name to the `Fill` method of the **DataAdapter**.
trans-unit.target: DataTableMapping 名称可以代替了传递<xref:System.Data.DataTable>名称到`Fill`方法**DataAdapter**。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[DataAdapter 数据表和 DataColumn 映射](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> class with a source when given a source table name and a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>与源类，在给定源表名称和<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>名称。

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive source table name from a data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据源的区分大小写的源表名称。

trans-unit.source: The table name from a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to map to.
trans-unit.target: 中的表名称<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>映射到。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref> class when given a source table name, a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> name, and an array of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping"></xref>类时提供源表名称， <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>名称，并将一个数组的<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive source table name from a data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据源的区分大小写的源表名称。

trans-unit.source: The table name from a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to map to.
trans-unit.target: 中的表名称<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>映射到。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A data column mapping collection.
trans-unit.target: 数据列映射集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the table name from a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置从的表名称<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The table name from a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中的表名称<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> from the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref> value and the name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>从指定<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>使用指定<xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref>值和名称<xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> exists, it is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>存在，它返回的状态。</xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> does not exist, for a given <xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>, the following actions occur: |MissingMappingAction|Action taken| |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|Creates a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> with the specified source column name as both the source column name and the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> column name.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在<xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>，为给定<xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>，会执行下列操作: |MissingMappingAction |执行操作 | |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|创建<xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>指定的源列名称与源列名称与<xref:System.Data.DataSet>列名称。</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> </xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> is not added to the collection.| |`Error`|An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is generated if the specified column mapping is missing.| |`Ignore`|Gets a null value.|
trans-unit.target: 此<xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>不添加到集合。 | |`Error`|如果未提供指定的列映射，则会生成<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。 | |`Ignore`|获取一个 null 值。 |</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 名称<xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: A data column.
trans-unit.target: 数据列。

trans-unit.source: The mappingAction parameter was set to , and no mapping was specified.
trans-unit.target: mappingAction 参数设置为 ，和未指定任何映射。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> object for a given column name.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>给定的列名称的对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: 数据类型`sourceColumn`。

trans-unit.target: 中的表名称<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>映射到。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.MissingSchemaAction"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Data.MissingSchemaAction"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> using the specified <xref href="System.Data.MissingSchemaAction"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>指定<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>使用指定<xref href="System.Data.MissingSchemaAction"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> does not exist, the specified <xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction> is taken.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.DataTable>不存在，指定<xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction>取自。</xref:System.Data.MissingSchemaAction> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> from which to get the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>从中获取<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>。
